modules.name: astra-mainplatform
build-commands: /bin/bash -c 'for f in astra-base/usr/lib/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/lib/; fi; done'
/bin/bash -c 'for f in astra-base/usr/share/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/share/; fi; done'
/bin/bash -c 'if [ -d astra-base/lib ]; then for f in astra-base/lib/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/lib/; fi; done; fi'
/bin/bash -c 'if [ -d astra-base/lib64 ]; then for f in astra-base/lib64/*; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -a "$f" ${FLATPAK_DEST}/usr/lib64/; fi; done; fi'
